name: Ostrumite Gunner
shortDescription: Martial inventors who wield a living gunblade powered by unstable magical crystal.
description: Ostrumite Gunners bond to a volatile crystal weapon that fuses steel and firearm into a single system. Through innovation, risk, and precision, they turn instability into overwhelming force.

features.name: Ostrumite Gunblade
features.description: You construct and bond to a unique Ostrumite-powered gunblade that functions as both a melee weapon and firearm.

features.name: Ostrumite Charges
features.description: You generate volatile Ostrumite energy used to fuel weapon effects, modifications, and overcharges.

features.name: Misfire & Overcharge
features.description: Spending excessive charges risks misfire, dealing damage to you and jamming your weapon.

features.name: Weapon Modifications
features.description: You install permanent modifications into your Ostrumite Gunblade, choosing from multiple mod categories.

subclass.label: Gunner Path
subclass.description: Choose a specialization that defines how you fight with your Ostrumite weapon.

features.name: Extra Attack
features.description: You can attack twice when you take the Attack action. One attack may be replaced with a firearm attack.

features.name: Reactive Shot
features.description: When a creature misses you, leaves your reach, or attacks an ally you can see, you may make a firearm attack as a reaction by spending 1 Ostrumite Charge.

features.name: Advanced Mods
features.description: You unlock more powerful Ostrumite weapon modifications.

features.name: Overcharge Mastery
features.description: Your control over Ostrumite improves, reducing misfire risk and enhancing successful overcharges.

features.name: Dual-Mode Assault
features.description: Once per turn, you may make one melee and one firearm attack as part of the same Attack action without spending a charge.

features.name: Stabilized Core
features.description: You ignore misfires unless you greatly exceed safe charge limits, and clearing jams becomes easier.

features.name: Perfect Synchronization
features.description: When combat begins and you have no Ostrumite Charges, you regain a portion automatically.

features.name: Living Ostrumite Engine
features.description: Your bond with Ostrumite reaches its peak, empowering your weapon and reducing the risks of instability.
